About

I'm a front end developer living in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. I build responsive interfaces for web applications and sites using handcrafted HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

I specialise in front end web technologies including HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript API's. I also have a good amount of experience working with mobile and tablet web browsers. I can write clean, semantic HTML & CSS, and I'm just as comfortable writing plain, vanilla JavaScript as I am picking up a popular library.

In my spare time I help out as a co-maintainer on Mobile Boilerplate, and also write the occasional guest post for HTML5 Doctor.

Feel free to check out some of my project work, read my blog, or get in touch. You can also find me online here:

  • GitHub
  • Twitter
  • Zerply

Colophon

  • This site is built using Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages.
  • Normalize.css is used as a baseline for cross browser CSS defaults.
  • Sass & Compass are used to author the site CSS.
  • Pygments provides syntax highlighting.
